entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:26 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 10:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
